titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Josina van der Maas Papers, 1953-1955
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2013

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Letters (in Dutch) from van der Maas to her family in the Netherlands while she was a student at Vassar College.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Van der Maas was a student at Vassar College and graduated with the Class of 1955. She went on to earn her Ph.D. in Chemistry from the University of Minnesota.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Letters (in Dutch) from van der Maas to her family in the Netherlands while she was a student at Vassar College. The letters form the basis of her book, Dutiful Daughter: A Foreign Student at Vassar.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Dutiful Daughter: Foreign Student at Vassar. Xlibris Corp, 2013.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Josina van der Maas, 2013.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Josina van der Maas Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
